segments.text: The water is just gushing out of that sink and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flowing right over the cabinet doors, saturating everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't anyone care about water damage?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, oblivious to the rising puddle around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is practically submerged already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the dampness and the slipperiness of the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water too, just running endlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are completely ignoring the disaster at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're focused only on their sugary prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene just makes me want to grab a mop and turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an absolute disregard for common sense and cleanliness.
segments.speaker: PAR
